name: Galaxy in Peril: Time Trouble
description:
The galaxy is in peril again. Falias forces have discovered wormholes to get to your galaxy again, and this time, they want more. They have planted a new device called the "Sonata" on multiple planets in the Union, and plan to blow them up to harvest the energy from your star! The only way to stop them is go back in time using a newly discovered, untested blackhole. Go back in time, find the locations of the Sonata device, and stop Falias from destroying everything you love!

-A story driven, singleplayer experience.

-Puzzles to solve.

-Multiple in-depth worlds to explore.

-Cutscenes to help players feel more engaged.

-And much, much more...
